about_the_game:
Choose your own adventure in this open-world humanity expansion space simulation.

Travel beyond the constellations to new frontiers. Explore, collect resources, supply the expansion efforts, or go battle it out spaceshooter style. Do we seek Galaversal Supremacy or peace? You decide !


Our quest is to expand humanity into deep space, but the pesky aliens see us as a viral entity that needs to be exterminated from existence.
Join a shared game experience where your actions contribute to humanity's survival in deep space.

Humanity goes viral
It's official.. our species has been declared a viral entity, and as such, must be exterminated.
The fight for our survival is real.
We must show strength and courage, and build up our infrastructure and defence as a deterent against those who oppose us.

Choose your own destiny.
You have the freedom to choose how to contribute to our goal, and can switch it up anytime you want.

For the first time in history, humanity has come together under one alliance.
The United Earth Space Alliance exists to implement humanity's expansion into the frontiers of space beyond our solar system.
The alliance consists of many factions that have their own objectives and quest systems.
Whether it be colonization, commerce, homeguard, or combat at the battlefront, the factions have quests to engage in.

Private Enterprise.
This is an optional deeper level of gameplay where you can construct your own supply chains and aid the factions in our ultimate quest of expansion and survival.

The factions are recruiting.
Join today, and help secure humanity's future.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: x86, x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated card
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 7 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Hardware vendor officially supported drivers.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: x86, x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX12 capable.
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
